QuestData.Title: Honor Challenge
QuestData.Description: The first step we're going to take is at a place in Jotunheim called the Savage Ledge. It's just over the mountains to the west.$B$BOn the ledge the vrykul warriors are always sparring, being instructed in the finer arts of battle by their thane's men.$B$BI want you to take this flag and issue a challenge to a number of them. Let's demoralize them with the 'mere' skills of a $r, shall we?$B$B<The duke grins, his rotting teeth flashing in the dim light of the vault.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault has asked you to use the Challenge Flag to challenge and defeat 6 Mjordin Combatants.
QuestData.CompletionText: Perhaps you could go back and challenge a few more?
QuestData.RewardText: Already I'm hearing reports of the prowess you displayed on the Savage Ledge. Excellent, $n... excellent!$B$B<The duke flashes his rictus smile again and you can almost hear the wheels in his head turning.>$B$BAnd now I think it's time to issue a decree to the thane of those vrykul that you so easily defeated.
